welcome_message_body: Welcome to Avondale, a charming city known for its historic downtown, vibrant arts scene, and beautiful parks. We're thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore all that Avondale has to offer and enjoy your time in our lovely city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Litchfield Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Litchfield Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buckeye Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and busiest at Sky Harbor, serving both domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the newest and most modern at Sky Harbor, serving primarily domestic airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Phoenix Deer Valley Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Phoenix Deer Valley Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
